nodes.text: A sail barge was a form of large, planetary repulsorlift transport that was commonly used as pleasurecraft by members of underworld cartels, including many Hutt kajidics. Sail barges could operate over a variety of terrain, including water, sand and snow. One of the most famous models of sail barge was the Ubrikkian Luxury sail barge. Jabba Desilijic Tiure owned one of these barges, which he named Khetanna.
